mapper.select: select refund_id, sale_id, refund_price, refund_desc, refund_status, refund_time, refund_type, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, delete_flag from seckill_refund where refund_id = #{refundId}
mapper.insert: insert into seckill_refund(sale_id, refund_price, refund_desc, refund_status, refund_time, refund_type, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, delete_flag) values (#{saleId}, #{refundPrice}, #{refundDesc}, #{refundStatus}, #{refundTime}, #{refundType}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{deleteFlag})

insert into seckill_refund(sale_id, refund_price, refund_desc, refund_status, refund_time, refund_type, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, delete_flag) values
(#{entity.saleId}, #{entity.refundPrice}, #{entity.refundDesc}, #{entity.refundStatus}, #{entity.refundTime}, #{entity.refundType}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.deleteFlag})

insert into seckill_refund(sale_id, refund_price, refund_desc, refund_status, refund_time, refund_type, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, delete_flag) values
(#{entity.saleId}, #{entity.refundPrice}, #{entity.refundDesc}, #{entity.refundStatus}, #{entity.refundTime}, #{entity.refundType}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.deleteFlag})
on duplicate key update sale_id = values(sale_id), refund_price = values(refund_price), refund_desc = values(refund_desc), refund_status = values(refund_status), refund_time = values(refund_time), refund_type = values(refund_type), create_by = values(create_by), create_time = values(create_time), update_by = values(update_by), update_time = values(update_time), delete_flag = values(delete_flag)
